arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola on City's Champions League participation: "We're in trouble, of course we are"
arts.sum: This Thursday, as part of the traditional Boxing Day celebrations, they drew at home to Everton, in what is their fourth game without a win in the Premier League and with a deep crisis of results that threaten, above all, their participation in the Champions League, where they are on the verge of elimination in the first round However, the club ended the year with just one win in their last nine Premier League games and have already slipped to sixth place in the table, 11 points behind leaders Liverpool, with two more games to play

arts.ttl: Michael Owen slams Man City fans after dismal record continues against Everton
arts.sum: Michael Owen criticised Manchester City fans for booing Pep Guardiola's players at full time of the champions' 1-1 Premier League draw against Everton on Boxing Day

arts.ttl: 'The biggest thing for me' - Sean Dyche addresses Iliman Ndiaye injury worry and talks Everton plan
arts.sum: Sean Dyche speaks after Everton drew 1-1 with Manchester City at the Etihad Stadium on Boxing Day

arts.ttl: The Verdict: Man City's struggle to find winning form continues
arts.sum: Sky Sports' Peter Stevenson reflects on Manchester City's 1-1 draw with Everton at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: 'Life is not easy' - Haaland penalty miss sums up Man City crisis
arts.sum: Erling Haaland's penalty miss against Everton sums up Manchester City's current crisis - with the striker's stats not what they were at his best.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Jordan Pickford's two clever moments before saving Erling Haaland penalty
arts.sum: Everton took a point away from Manchester City as Erling Haaland was denied by Jordan Pickford, who saved a second-half penalty after some shrewd tactics to thwart the Norwegian

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola gives surprising reaction to Manchester City failure vs Everton
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola felt his Manchester City team played well in draw against Everton but he was left ruing the champions' failure to put away their chances away

arts.ttl: Man City next six fixtures compared to Arsenal, Liverpool and Chelsea after Everton despair
arts.sum: Manchester City drew 1-1 in the Premier League with Everton on Boxing Day

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche has just done what nobody expected as Everton theories fall flat
arts.sum: Chris Beesley writes after Everton draw 1-1 at Manchester City to more points off the Premier League leading lights

arts.ttl: Man City fans are all saying the same thing about Erling Haaland after 1-1 draw against Everton on Boxing Day
